DOC.brief_title: Treatment Of Symptomatic Asthma In Children
DOC.detailed_description: A multicentre , randomise , double blind , parallel group study compare efficacy safety Salmeterol/Fluticasone propionate combination product ( Seretide® ) 50/100mcg Fluticasone propionate ( Flixotide® ) 200mcg , deliver twice daily via DISKUS inhaler , treatment child age 6-12 year symptomatic asthma .
